images.prompt: A raw, ultra-realistic 8k photograph of a stunningly beautiful, young Japanese model, exuding a cool and independent aura. She’s framed in an extreme close-up on her large, expressive eyes – an innocent, captivating gaze. Shot on Sony A7R IV, 85mm f/1.4 GM lens, depth of field, ray tracing, global illumination, black and white classic portrait, realistic skin texture, visible pores, faint vellus hair.8k photo, Large breasts, deep cleavage, ample cleavage, sexy photo, beautilful girl without makeup
